Chinese investment in U.S. plunged amid Trade War

Ming Li

Published Oct 11, 2019

Chinese companies invested only 4.8 billion U.S. dollars in the United States in 2018, down 84 percent from 29 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 and 90 percent from 46 billion U.S. dolallrs in 2016.

This represents the lowest level seen in seven years, as the ranging trade war since early 2018 between the two sides worsened the situation.

Source: Rohdium Group

Roles involved: Data cleaning, Python, design, d3.js, d3-annotation and web implementation

Data and codes: Github Page
